title: Understanding Pivot Tables
text: Pivot tables are a powerful tool in data analysis. They help in summarizing large datasets and making them more understandable.

title: Key Features of Pivot Tables
text: Consider how pivot tables allow you to reorganize and summarize data without altering the original dataset.

hintAnswer: To summarize and analyze data by organizing it into a more manageable format
title: Purpose of Pivot Tables
text: What is the primary purpose of using a pivot table in data analysis?
choices: To summarize and analyze data by organizing it into a more manageable format.
To create visual charts and graphs automatically.
To store large amounts of data efficiently.
To ensure data is encrypted and secure
